reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Improvement of capacities in National TB Reference Laboratories in the East, Central and Southern Africa region

description.narrative: Multicountry Africa ECSA-HC - Tuberculosis - East, Central and Southern Africa Health Community - ECSA-HC. This program has the following goals: Build a regional network of National TB reference Laboratories (NRLs) for inter-state laboratory quality assurance and management in the ECSA countries. Improved Laboratory service provision for quality assured 1st and 2nd line Drug susceptibility testing accessible to needed people of the ECSA region. Enhanced impact of rapid molecular TB diagnostic testings in the region and building capacity of NRLs to undertake epidemiological/national level- disease monitoring surveys such as DRS and TB disease prevalence. The objectives of this program are: Objective 1: To Establish a regional network of 18 National TB Reference Laboratires in sub-saharan Africa (among ECSA states). Objective 2: To provide quality trainings to NRL lab staff of 18 countries and to provide Supranational TB Reference laboratory (SNRL) services to the region- prioritized by country needs. Objective 3: To provide technical support for conducting anti-TB Drug resistance surveillance, TB prevalence surveys, and Expansion of rapid TB diagnostic testing

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for QPA-T-ECSA
TCP-Other 9: Number of regional MTB strains from MDR-TB patients processsed for WGS at SRL
TCP Other-1: Number and percentage of NRLs that have received ISO Accreditation
Lab - Other 1: Number and percent of NRLs that have achieved a two (2) incremental progress towards achieving accreditation but still below 4 star accreditation status
Percentage of National Reference Laboratories accredited according to ISO15189 standard or achieving at least 4 stars towards accreditation
MDR TB-Other 2: Number and percentage of NTRLs able to provide 1st line DST
TCP-Other 8: Number and percent of NTRLs able to provide quality assured 2nd line DST
TCP - Other 2: Number and percent of NRLs who have developed TB Lab Strategic plans / integrated Lab component in TB/Lab NSPs
TCP - Other 1: Number and percent of NRLs monitoring and reporting TB cases among laboratory staff
MDR-TB - Other 2: Number and percent of NTRLs able to provide quality assured 2nd line DST

Percentage of laboratories showing adequate performance in external quality assurance for smear microscopy among the total number of laboratories that undertake smear microscopy during the reporting period
TCP-Other 5: Percentage of DST laboratories showing adequate performance on External Quality Assurance either through Phenotypic and/or Genotypic
TCP-Other 2: Number of countries receiving at least 1 supervision visit conducted according to the supervision checklist by Uganda SRL and/or with other NRLs per year with support from the project
TCP-Other 7: Number and percent of NTRLs able to provide quality assured 1st line DST
Lab - Other 2: Number and percent of NRLs that have received ISO 17043: certification for coordination of national EQA scheme
MDR-TB - Other 1: Number and percent of NTRLs able to provide quality assured 1st line DST
Percentage of DST laboratories showing adequate performance on External Quality Assurance
TCP-Other 6: Number of NRLs receiving direct service support to conduct 2nd line DST from Uganda SRL
TCP-Other 3: Number of NRLs monitoring and reporting TB cases among laboratory staff
TCP-Other 1: Number and percent of NRLs that have received ISO 15189:2012 standard accreditation
TCP-Other 4: Number of NRLs who have developed TB Lab Strategic plans / integrated Lab component in TB/Lab NSPs
Number of TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB notified
MDR TB-Other 3: Number and percentage of NTRLs able to provide 2nd line DST to 100% of MDRTB cases
MDR TB-Other 1: Number of TB Samples Strains (Isolated during Surveillance) sent to and retested by the SRL
TCP Other-2: Number of supervisory visit conduted by ECSA-HC, SRL UG and other SRLs per year
MDR TB-Other 4: Number MDR-TB patients receiving 2nd line DST (denominator MDR-notified)
